Room.Name: Main Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along the central hallway of the Temple of the Rising Moon.
Room.LongDescription: The long hallway you are walking down is decorated in the finest golds and silvers the lands have to offer. Donations from the wealthy and the poor all go towards dedicating the temple to Artemis, who demands only the best from her worshippers. On the south wall, there is a door which leads to the New Worshippers Office. On the east wall is an unmarked door.
